Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.def.validation.javascript

This package contains classes which support validation of expressions written in the javascript language.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AeAbstractJavaScriptExpressionValidator This is a base class for JavaScript expression validators.
AeBPWSJavaScriptExpressionValidator A BPEL 1.1 implementation of a JavaScript expression validator.
AeWSBPELJavaScriptExpressionValidator A BPEL 2.0 implementation of a JavaScript expression validator.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.def.validation.javascript Description

This package contains classes which support validation of expressions written in the javascript language.
